str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To endure, bear with, have patience with, suffer, admit, persist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To enslave. From kata and douloo; to enslave utterly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To eat up, eat till it is finished, devour, squander, annoy, injure. From kata and esthio; to eat down, i.e. Devour.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up. From epi and airo; to raise up.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To flay, flog, scourge, beat. A primary verb; properly, to flay, i.e. to scourge, or to thrash.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
